text: @FOX46News @NC_Governor @POTUS Trump will cancel the RNC and blame Governor Cooper. Privately, in reality, he knows he can't have any packed arenas because of the coronavirus, but he's too cowardly to take on any responsibility. That's why, publicly, he will lay the blame on the governor.
